text: OAuth1 allows custom signature methods and the ability to customize the method was recently added to the client side in #239. It would be neat to enable this customization on the server side as well. However, it should come well documented with advise/warning about the risks of rolling your own crypto.
title: OAuth1 Server: Enable custom signature methods
